sourcesContent:
Button Clicks

{{ message }}

Button Name Click Count Entry Time
{{ click.button_name }} {{ click.click_count }} {{ click.entry_time }}

Button Click Totals

Button Name Total Clicks
{{ total.button_name }} {{ total.total_clicks }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ButtonClickService } from '../../services/button-click.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-page5', templateUrl: './page5.component.html', styleUrls: ['./page5.component.css'] }) export class Page5Component implements OnInit { userId: number | null = null; buttonClicks: any[] = []; buttonClickTotals: { button_name: string, total_clicks: number }[] = []; message: string = ''; constructor(private buttonClickService: ButtonClickService, private router: Router) {} ngOnInit(): void { const userIdFromStorage = sessionStorage.getItem('userId'); this.userId = userIdFromStorage ? parseInt(userIdFromStorage, 10) : null; this.fetchButtonClicks(); } fetchButtonClicks(): void { if (this.userId === null) { this.message = 'User ID is required'; return; } this.buttonClickService.getButtonClicks(this.userId).subscribe( (response: any[]) => { console.log('Button Clicks Response:', response); this.buttonClicks = response.sort((a, b) => new Date(a.entry_time).getTime() - new Date(b.entry_time).getTime()); this.message = ''; this.calculateButtonClickTotals(); }, (error: any) => { this.message = 'Error fetching button clicks'; console.error(error); } ); } calculateButtonClickTotals(): void { const totals: { [key: string]: number } = {}; this.buttonClicks.forEach(click => { if (totals[click.button_name]) { totals[click.button_name] += click.click_count; } else { totals[click.button_name] = click.click_count; } }); this.buttonClickTotals = Object.keys(totals).map(button_name => ({ button_name, total_clicks: totals[button_name] })); } logout() { console.log('User logged out'); sessionStorage.removeItem('userId'); this.router.navigate(['/login']); } goToUpdates(): void { this.router.navigate(['/navigation']); } }
